title: Aen 2 438-441 - SS sight - line 3 - Myth - Mars

content.description:
A City Observed

Hic vero ingentem pugnam, ceuceu, adv.: as if cetera nusquamnusquam, adv.: nowhere 
bella forentforent = essent, nulli tota morerentur in urbe, 
sic MartemMars, Martis, m.: the god Mars indomitumindomitus, -a, -um, adj.: unrestrained, Danaosque ad tecta ruentesruo, -ere: to rush 
cernimuscerno, -ere = video, -ere.1
 1:The subject of cernimus is Aeneas and other Trojans.↩
